The Shape
of
College

is a collection of stories outlining various perspectives on the college experience and how people move beyond admissions.

We publish weekly, and we welcome your participation! If you want to join the team, submit a story, ask a question, or give feedback, please email: hi (snail) theshapeofcollege (point) com.

Check out our most recent stories or the full list. If you like what you read, you may sign up to get an email when a new story comes out.


This project is dedicated to all our teachers.
